lead_paragraph: EINBENDER--Alvin. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of a dear friend and leader, Alvin Einbender, who leaves behind a loving family to carry on a tradition of Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Alvin's wife, Joan; his children, Alison, Jay, Gail, and Karen; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
